text: Herbert Leon "Sonny" Callahan (September 11, 1932 - June 24, 2021) was an American businessman and politician. He was elected as a Democrat from Mobile.Two incumbents faced opposition Tuesday in Alabama's congressional primaries,... Callahan was repeatedly elected as a Republican to the United States House of Representatives, serving from 1985 to 2003. Callahan died on June 24, 2021 in Mobile at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Sonny Callahan on the Issues * Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:United States representatives from Alabama Category:Politicians from Mobile, Alabama Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Mobile, Alabama Category:Members of the Alabama Legislature
title: Sonny Callahan
